Scavenged Armor.description: A scavenged set of Light Armorjack body armor that is unable to be repaired. Refer to full item description on BC+ pg. 4.

Piranha Smash.name: Piranha Smash
Piranha Smash.description:
Looks like smash but it's smash with a lime flavor. And a lower risk of addiction.

Primary Effect

Dose lasts 4 hours.

The user feels happy and satisfied, receiving a temporary modifier of +2 to the following skills

  • Acting
  • Dance
  • Contortionist
  • Conversation
  • Human Perception
  • Persuasion

Secondary Effect (DV9)

When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV.

If this fails, they take a -2 to the following skills

  • Acting
  • Dance
  • Contortionist
  • Conversation
  • Human Perception
  • Persuasion

Bullet To Slug Adapter Casings.name: Bullet To Slug Adapter Casings
Bullet To Slug Adapter Casings.description:
Make any bullet able to be fired as a shotgun slug.

A box of Bullet to Slug Adapter Casings comes with 10 casings.

You can load 10 bullets into 10 adapters using the included jig in an Action. If loading by hand it takes an Action to load 1 bullet.

Solo of Fortune Bodypillow.name: Solo of Fortune Bodypillow
Solo of Fortune Bodypillow.description:
Bodypillow with the image of a famous Solo from the 2020s (such as Morgan Blackhand, BoaBoa Weyland, or Adam Smasher).

20 inches x 54 inches (50.8 cm x 137.16 cm), except for the Adam Smasher pillow which is considerably larger.

Big Dreem.name: Big Dreem
Big Dreem.description: Exotic SMG. Autofire only. Even if you drop the weapon, it will continue to Autofire.

Hello Cutie 1TruLuv.name: Hello Cutie 1TruLuv
Hello Cutie 1TruLuv.description:
Exotic Sniper Rifle. Can load non basic ammunition.

Equipped with a Sniping Scope and Infrared Night Vision Scope*, and built-in Agent which includes a pseudo AI girlfriend who can recognize and talk to the owner.

Take good care of it/her and use it/her regularly and the weapon improves. Neglect it/her and you'll have to apologize...

* These upgrades need to be installed manually after adding to an actor

Molotov Cocktail.name: Molotov Cocktail
Molotov Cocktail.description: Fragile Incendiary Grenade. Set a target Deadly on Fire (see CP:R p.180)

SportMaster.name: SportMaster
SportMaster.description: A sport rifle, for fun, not people. Can only load Small Game Ammunition and is incapable of Autofire and Suppressive Fire.

SurvivalMaster.name: SurvivalMaster
SurvivalMaster.description: Exotic Assault Rifle, no Autofire, no Suppressive Fire.
